pytest

rstcheck
black
coverage

[dev-duckdb]

[dev-duckdb:implementation_name != "pypy"]
duckdb

[dev-mariadb]
mariadb

[dev-mssql]
pymssql

[dev-mysql]

[dev-postgres]

pg8000

[dev-postgres:python_version < "3.13" and implementation_name != "pypy"]
asyncpg
psycopg2

[dev-sqlite]
aiosqlite

[dev-sqlite:implementation_name != "pypy"]
apsw

twine
